experiences.description: Leading backend development for a B2B SaaS platform automating legal workflows for business setup in Saudi Arabia. Built OCR services, government API monitoring, visa/payroll systems, and integrated with Xero, HubSpot, and ZATCA for compliance.
Built AI-powered candidate-job matching system and resume parsing service. Developed backend services for talent platform and hospital inventory management system (CCMS), improving efficiency by 40%.
Built hotel search engine with MongoDB advanced search, Redis caching, and OTA integrations. Implemented secure payment gateways and optimized performance for millions of listings.

Developed backend for a quality management platform (Mondoq), enabling efficient audits, service order tracking, and automated task workflows. Improved operational efficiency by 300% through automation and enhanced communication by 60%.
